content: **knitted hat with rib and earflaps for baby and children in drops merino extra fine** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-045-by -------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years head circumference approx 40/42 - 42/44 - 44/46 48/50 - 50/52 cm / 16 -17 -18 19 -20 **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 50-50-50 100-100 g color no 08 light beige mix drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 4 mm / us 6 - or size needed to get correct gauge drops circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 5 mm / us 4 for rib **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b20&d_id=9
